Name: My Naughty Summer Vacation ~Days in Countryside and Memories of Summer~
About the game: An 3D simulation RPG in which the main character returns to the countryside and enjoys his summer vacation. Let's spend a special summer in the countryside with heroines, by talking, go to various places with countryside, playing, and others, while making memories of the summer. ~Point~ ・Let's talk a lot with heroines! ・You can go to various places in the countryside field. ・Various conversation events are available in the field. If you make the right choice, the heroine's likability will increase. ・Time passes as you walk through the field. Some events are limited to specific time periods. ・Summer vacation will end in about 30 days. Get to know the heroines and play with them before the end of summer vacation. ~Story~ In the hot summer sun, I came to the countryside. My grandfather picked me up and drove me to the house where I was going to spend my summer vacation. There was a girl wearing a white one-piece dress. Bug catching, chasing, summer festivals... Special memories of one summer.
